channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Soho in London was formerly a town of immigrants. Long known as one of the most bohemian areas of London, Soho is considered the place for enjoying the arts, revelry, and late-night entertainment.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: In 2024, a team led by Saito Kentaro won the bronze trophy as well as a special prize at the prestigious Montreal International Fireworks Competition. He talks about what fireworks mean to him.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Many mountains in Japan that attract tourists are active volcanoes. Learn safety tips for climbing and the latest on eruption prediction research.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #41 Can we buy tickets? / To ask someone if you can do something, say the verb to indicate your desired action, followed by "koto ga" and "dekimasu," meaning something is possible. Then add "ka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: This program highlights the "Osaka Month" feature aired in May, showcasing Osaka's food culture, such as udon and seafood. It also covers the NHK WORLD-JAPAN PR event at NHK Osaka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Sado Island - Into the Mystic Dreams.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: With colorful pile fabric and comfortable knits, Wakayama prefecture is drawing global attention as a textile hub. We bring you striking images of its machines and the beat of its factories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to ships. Explore the unique culture behind them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Century Signboards
channel.desc: Edo Kiriko cut glass techniques, passed from artisan to artisan for over 100 years. More women who now pursue the craft create popular new designs.

channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Detecting vulnerable plaques is now possible using the latest intravascular imaging technology. We focus on how this can help with early detection of heart disease and prevention of its recurrence.
